com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop

Interface PointcutBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericPointcutBuilder

    public interface PointcutBuilder

    Provides an API for constructing Pointcut definitions from an AspectDefinition.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 12/28/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<Pointcut> build(java.util.Collection<AspectDefinition> aspects)
      Builds a collection of Pointcut definitions from the given set of AspectDefinitions.
